about_the_game:
Get revenge on the turkeys after Thanksgiving!

Your Mission

1. Blast turkeys with your shotgun

2. Skewer the dead turkeys onto your pitchfork

3. Process them with an oversized meat grinder

4. Cook them over a campfire

5. Feed "Grimm" before he gets too hangry

6. Repeat

Mechanics

  • Multiplayer

  • Proximity voice chat

  • Shotgun-powered flight

  • Procedural map generation

This Game & The Future

This is my first Steam game, so this is definitely a learning experience for me. I aimed to create this game in just a couple months combining features and experience I gained from other projects.

I hope to continue making proximity chat multiplayer games using these same little bean characters and exploring game ideas that I am passionate about.

To stay updated or provide much appreciated feedback, join the Discord server either with the button in game or click the link in the right side panel.
